title: Expert Instagram Virtual Assistant / Manager
job_overview:
Hi, I'm Eric.

We’re looking for a driven, high motivated digital professional to help manage and grow all aspects of our online presence.

This isn’t for someone who needs constant direction. We want a self-starter who can:
 • Manage social platforms (especially Instagram).
 • Stay on top of digital trends across multiple platforms.
 • Handle outreach, DMs, and community engagement.
 • Assist with content, research, and other growth-focused tasks.

What You’ll Do
 • Grow and manage social media accounts (posting, engagement, analytics).
 • Research trends and create fresh content ideas.
 • Manage DMs and build relationships with followers and partners.
 • Support digital operations (light admin, outreach, and creative tasks).

What We’re Looking For
 • Experience with social media and digital marketing.
 • Strong understanding of online trends and audience engagement.
 • Excellent written English for captions and DMs.
 • Proactive, resourceful, and results-driven.
 • Reliable internet and ability to work US hours (or partial overlap).
 • (Preference: Young Male, 18 - 30, understands social media trends)

How to Apply - Response to these questions:
 1. Share links to your portfolio / social media accounts or digital work you’ve done.
 2. What’s the hardest you’ve ever worked on something in your life, and why did you do it?
 3. Why should we hire you out of the 1,000+ applicants we recieve?

Apply now if you’re ready to prove you’re the one.
